zxiong.shapes

类 Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • zxiong.shapes.Shape
      • zxiong.shapes.Line

  • public class Line
extends Shape

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Line()
      Creates a default instance of a Line object with all dimensions set to zero
      Line(double x, double y, double x2, double y2)
      Creates a line object with the start point(x,y), end point(x2,y2).
      Line(double x, double y, double degree, double length, boolean lineSwitch)
      Creates a line object with the start point(x,y), angle of degree and length of length.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Line

        public Line()
        Creates a default instance of a Line object with all dimensions set to zero.*
        Postcondition:
        Create a line with all dimensions of zero.

      • Line

        public Line(double x,
            double y,
            double x2,
            double y2)
        Creates a line object with the start point(x,y), end point(x2,y2).
        参数:
        x - x-coordinate of the starting point.
        y - y-coordinate of the starting point.
        x2 - x-coordinate of the ending point.
        y2 - y-coordinate of the ending point.
        Precondition:
        all dimensions must be positive.
        Postcondition:
        a line is created.

      • Line

        public Line(double x,
            double y,
            double degree,
            double length,
            boolean lineSwitch)
        Creates a line object with the start point(x,y), angle of degree and length of length.
        参数:
        x - x-coordinate of the starting point.
        y - y-coordinate of the starting point.
        degree - the angle of the line .
        length - length of the line.
        lineSwitch - to switch this line mode.
        Precondition:
        x, y must be positive.
        Postcondition:
        a line is created.

      • setPoint2

        public void setPoint2(double x2,
                      double y2)
        set the location of the end point of the line
        参数:

        y2 - y-coordinate of the end point.

      • getArea

        public double getArea()
        Calculates and returns the area of the line.
        指定者:
        getArea 在类中 Shape
        返回:
        The area of line, which is 0.

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        Determines whether the point x,y is contained inside this Line.
        指定者:
        isPointInside 在类中 Shape
        参数:
        x - The X-coordinate of the point.
        y - The Y-coordinate of the point.
        返回:
        True if point is inside, false if point is outside (always false).

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset all dimension of a line to zero.
        指定者:
        reset 在类中 Shape
        Postcondition:
        Side affect: All dimension reset to zero.

      • convertX2

        public double convertX2()
        calculate the x2 location of the line.
        返回:
        x2 value
        Postcondition:
        Side affect: x2 gets a new value.

      • convertY2

        public double convertY2()
        calculate the y2 location of the line.
        返回:
        y2 value
        Postcondition:
        Side affect: y2 gets a new value.

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
        Draws a new instance of a line object.
        覆盖:
        draw 在类中 Shape
        参数:

        Postcondition:
        a line get drawn on the surface.

        public boolean intersects(Line other)
        If the two lines intersect with each other.
        参数:
        other - the other line.
        返回:
